title: Checkout error 500 on mobile
recommended_action: Escalate to payments team; link incident INC-2023-09-10
content: Users see 500 when checking out on mobile under heavy load.

title: Payment declined due to card limits
recommended_action: Advise user to contact bank; retry with another card
content: Some banks decline payments for certain merchants.

title: Login fails with invalid session
recommended_action: Ask user to clear cookies and retry; investigate session store
content: Expired or invalid session tokens can cause 401/invalid login.

title: Slow API responses during peak
recommended_action: Investigate autoscaling and infra; add retries
content: API latency increases when CPU saturates.

title: SDK throws TypeError on init
recommended_action: Patch SDK release and notify customers
content: Certain versions of SDK fail when config is missing.

title: Two-factor authentication setup issues
content: Users sometimes don't receive SMS codes.

title: Data export failing for large accounts
content: Large exports may hit memory limits.

title: Password reset email not received
recommended_action: Check email provider and resend link
content: Some email providers mark reset emails as spam.
